Abstract:
Technical Education- Government Engineering College Sreekrishnapuram,
Palakkad- Additional charge of Administrative Assistant to Shri. Ragesh R,
Senior Superintendent- proceedings- Ratified- Orders issued.
Order Issued By:
(By order of the Governor)
SREEKALA S
DEPUTY SECRETARY
Body Para:
In the circumstances reported by the Director of Technical Education as per
the letter read above, Government are pleased to ratify the action of the
Director of Technical Education, Thiruvananthapuram in according full
additional charge of Administrative Assistant, Government Engineering
College Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad to Shri. Ragesh R, Senior Superintendent,
Government Engineering College, Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad for the period
trom 01.06.2020 to 02.07.2020, under Rule 53(b) Part 1 KSR.
References:
Read:1. Letter No. ED1/13067/16/DTE dated 26.08.2020 from the Director
of Technical Education, Thiruvananthapuram.
2.Proceedings No. ED1/13067/16/DTE dated 28.05.2020 of the
Director of Technical Education, Thiruvananthapuram.
